content: I'm feeling pretty confident about tackling the project proposal work on Monday. I've got a good idea of what needs to be done, and I'm looking forward to making some progress on it. One thing I'm wondering is, can you suggest some tools or apps that I can use to help me stay organized and focused while working on the proposal? I've got a lot of ideas swirling around in my head, and I want to make sure I can keep track of everything.
